entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Nipawin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -24.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Nipawin Airport 8:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -24.1°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 14.5 km
Humidity: 60 %

Dewpoint: -29.6°C

Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clearing early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 46 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 38 in the evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
